abstract: Among information the special committee is seeking is a draft of the new proposal and who would run the company if Carl C. Icahn and Southeastern Asset Management succeed.
snippet: Among information the special committee is seeking is a draft of the new proposal and who would run the company if Carl C. Icahn and Southeastern Asset Management succeed.
lead_paragraph: The special committee of Dell’s board overseeing the sale of the computer maker asked Carl C. Icahn and Southeastern Asset Management on Monday to furnish more information about their recent demand for a special dividend.

headline.main: Dell Demands More Details From Icahn and Southeastern

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
